# tf.contrib.summary.image

Writes an image summary if possible.

``` python
tf.contrib.summary.image(
    name,
    tensor,
    bad_color=None,
    max_images=3,
    family=None,
    step=None
)
```



Defined in [`python/ops/summary_ops_v2.py`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r1.14/tensorflow/python/ops/summary_ops_v2.py).
